full_summary:
# Request for Proposal - West Block Air Filters
Implementation date:*October 26, 2022*

Bidders are invited by the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) to submit proposals to provide Air Filters for the West Block, Quantity to be determined.

Eligibility Criteria and Requirements:
+   Suppliers must be qualified to do business with the Canadian Government.
+   Suppliers must hold the required classification of businesses, such as the Small Business Classification.

Contract Details:
+   **Reference Number:** WS3705892181-Doc3715767205
+   **Solicitation Number:** WS3705892181
+   **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
+   **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal
+   **Trade Agreements:** None
+   **Regions of Opportunity:** None

Proposal Submission and Evaluation:
+   Bids are to be submitted electronically not later than November 10, 2022 at 2:00 PM, Oregon Standard Time.
+   Proposals will be evaluated based on lowest price.

For more information on this request, please visit:

+Ariba Contract Management Platform: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14421774?extsite=MTQ0MjE3NzRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==\&orderId=14421774](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14421774?extsite=MTQ0MjE3NzRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==\&orderId=14421774)

Contact Information:
